speaker: Narrator
dialog: You arrive back at base camp, exhausted and battered, but triumphant.

speaker: COMMANDER FABIUS
dialog: Excellent work, Hunter! The people of Kunafa Village can rest easy now.

speaker: ALMA
dialog: Let's get you patched up and rested for tomorrow.
